body.bibl: Arzhanov, Yury N. “Some Notes on the Syriac Text of Porphyry’s On Principles and Matter.” In Porphyry in Syriac: The Treatise On Principles and Matter and Its Place in the Greek, Latin, and Syriac Philosophical Traditions, edited by Yury N.
